identified_risks.response_actions: Implement data replication, conduct multiple practice migrations, optimize migration scripts, have rollback plan ready

identified_risks.risk_description: Key team member leaves during project
identified_risks.response_actions: Cross-train team members, document processes, have backup personnel identified, offer retention bonuses
Implement strict cost monitoring, use AWS cost optimization tools, set up alerts, conduct weekly cost reviews
Conduct security audits at each phase, use AWS security best practices, perform penetration testing, implement automated security scanning
Early testing of all integrations, involve third-party vendors in planning, have fallback options ready, allocate extra time for troubleshooting
Accelerate AWS training programs, hire AWS consultant for knowledge transfer, pair experienced with inexperienced staff

identified_risks.risk_description: Project timeline slips due to unforeseen technical issues
identified_risks.response_actions: Build buffer into schedule, identify tasks that can be fast-tracked, have additional resources on standby, conduct daily progress reviews

identified_risks.risk_description: Data loss or corruption during migration
identified_risks.response_actions: Implement multiple backup strategies, verify data integrity after each migration step, have disaster recovery plan in place

identified_risks.risk_description: Compliance requirements not met in cloud environment
identified_risks.response_actions: Engage compliance officer early, use AWS compliance tools, conduct third-party compliance audit, document all controls meticulously

identified_risks.risk_description: User resistance to new cloud-based systems
identified_risks.response_actions: Develop comprehensive change management plan, provide ample training, gather user feedback early, showcase benefits of new system
